<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Good morning </strong>and welcome back (?) to the week. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">When we launched the Daily Quarantine Planner to help readers fill their suddenly empty calendars, we didn’t know what to expect. Well, that section turned out to be a huge hit...and now we’re upgrading.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Today, that planner is now The Essentials, a free evening newsletter to help you stay active, healthy, and happy while riding out the pandemic at home. The newsletter comes out every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday, which means the first edition is hitting inboxes in just a few hours.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/the-essentials?utm_source=daily&utm_medium=nl&utm_campaign=042019&email={email}" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Get The Essentials</a>.</p>

<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
MEDIA
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/04/05/will-coronavirus-cramp-boost-quibis-launch?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Quibi's Here to Tank Your Screen Time Report
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="GIF of Quibi " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=378 src="https://oslo-production.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/medium/asset/478/quibi_gif.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="GIF of Quibi " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://oslo-production.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/medium/asset/478/quibi_gif.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Quibi</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Today's a big one. We put on pants for the first time in 24 days and Quibi finally launched. Led by former chair of The Walt Disney Studios Jeffrey Katzenberg and former HPE CEO Meg Whitman, Quibi is not only a grand experiment in mobile-first streaming, but the first major launch of the coronavirus pandemic. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0"><strong style="color:#000">The details</strong></h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Quibi serves up "quick bites" of video from news to docuseries to feature films. Its signature "Turnstyle" tech lets you rotate the orientation of your phone without interrupting the video.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The bull case: </strong>Quibi raised $1.8 billion before even launching. It's a completely new streaming product catering to Gen Z and millennials and already has 50 shows ready featuring names like Steven Spielberg, Reese Witherspoon, and JLo. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Coronavirus has shut down most entertainment production, but Quibi's elbow-bumping itself for </span><span><a href="https://www.forbes.com/sites/dawnchmielewski/2020/04/03/coronavirus-lockdown-will-boost-jeff-katzenbergs-and-meg-whitmans-new-mobile-streaming-service-quibi/#430e843955c3?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">stockpiling</a></span><span> content last fall over fears of a writers' strike. Whitman told Morning Brew’s </span><span><a href="https://link.chtbl.com/megwhitman_all?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333"><em>Business Casual</em></a></span><span> podcast they've got enough programming to last through mid-September. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The bear case: </strong>Consumer awareness is pretty low and Quibi doesn't have a Jim Halpert fans will follow anywhere. Also...YouTube and TikTok are free. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">The COVID-19 case </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Whitman and Katzenberg wanted Quibi <a href="https://cheddar.com/media/will-the-coronavirus-pandemic-help-or-hurt-streaming-service-quibi?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">to fill</a> those 10-minute breaks that pop up throughout your day, like waiting for a subway to arrive or for your CVS receipt to finish printing. Even with quarantines in place, Whitman thinks people will need small pockets of time to decompress.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">One big thing going for Quibi: Consumers are spending a <em>lot</em> more time streaming, per Emerging Tech Brew's <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/emerging-tech/stories/2020/04/03/covid-traffic-report?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">COVID-19 Traffic Report</a>. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><img src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80NDAvc3RyZWFtaW5nX3N0YXRzX25pZWxzZW4ucG5nIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIn0=" class="img-responsive" width="640" style="width:100% !important;max-width: 640px; width: 100%;" alt="" data-reactroot=""></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 22px;"><small> <em>Francis Scialabba</em> </small></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">And revenue? </strong>Quibi sold out its first year's ad inventory ($150 million) last fall, though the ad industry looks like a playground spring rider right now.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Quibi also has monthly subscription fees ($5/month with ads; $8 without). But Whitman said if you sign up by the end of April, you'll get 90 days free due to the pandemic.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">+ Now, hear from Whitman herself: </strong>She's the guest on today's special episode of <em>Business Casual</em>. Listen here: <a href="https://link.chtbl.com/megwhitman_apple?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Apple</a> / <a href="https://link.chtbl.com/megwhitman_spotify?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Spotify</a> / <a href="https://link.chtbl.com/megwhitman_all?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">everywhere else</a></p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
INTERNATIONAL
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/04/05/latest-coronavirus-updates-around-world?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
COVID-19 Around the World
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The U.S.: </strong>President Trump warned of a couple of very difficult weeks ahead, with the worst of the crisis expected to peak in hotspots like New York in a few days. "This is the moment to do everything you can" to remain isolated, <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-04-04/trump-says-to-brace-for-very-very-deadly-period-due-to-virus?sref=1crrKBaO&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">said</a> WH coronavirus task force coordinator Deborah Birx. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Germany: </strong>Experts are studying why the country, which has nearly 100,000 COVID-19 cases, has such a <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2020/04/04/world/europe/germany-coronavirus-death-rate.html?searchResultPosition=1&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">low death rate</a> compared to its peers. On Sunday, Germany reported its third-straight daily drop in new cases. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Italy: </strong>Officials are hoping the worst is over after the number of coronavirus patients in intensive care <a href="https://nypost.com/2020/04/05/coronavirus-death-toll-slows-in-italy-as-icu-patients-declines/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">dropped</a> for the first time on Saturday. Italy started halting nonessential economic activity in early March.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Australia: </strong>The government also believes it's <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-health-coronavirus-australia/australia-upbeat-over-slowing-coronavirus-spread-urges-vigilance-idUSKBN21N03U?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">turned a corner</a>, but said social distancing measures will be the norm for months.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">And everywhere...</strong>countries are <a href="https://www.ft.com/content/5c8cbc60-aec0-4f3d-b0e2-a5e44f0c6f74?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">stockpiling staple foods</a> to make sure they can feed their populations, the FT reports. Morocco and the Philippines have bolstered their grain reserves, while Turkish traders are paying top price to import wheat. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"></p>

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
SPORTS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/04/05/call-sports-commissioners-trump-declines-commit-return-date?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
President Trump Goes Around the Horn
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">On Saturday, President Trump held a <a href="https://apnews.com/4c63d4382453e89bd169fdbfa29fc746?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">conference call</a> with commissioners and execs from 13 U.S. sports leagues, from men's and women's basketball to Nascar and the Breeders' Cup.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The question on everyone's mind: When will sports be back? </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">"I can't tell you a date," Trump said after the call, though he said he thinks it will be "sooner rather than later." The same day, CA Governor Gavin Newsom <a href="https://www.si.com/nfl/2020/04/04/donald-trump-sports-call-nfl-season-start-fans-return-coronavirus?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">said</a> he doesn't expect the 2020 NFL season to start on schedule in his state.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Sports returning is not only a symbolic part of resuming our "normal lives," but also a question of restarting the economy. Consider the millions of jobs that are connected to sports: TV advertising, box office staff, parking garage attendants, security personnel, and many more.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Elsewhere in the sports world…</strong></p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Kobe Bryant and Tim Duncan were among nine players </span><span><a href="http://www.hoophall.com/news/naismith-memorial-basketball-hall-of-fame-class-of-2020-announcement/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">elected</a></span><span> to the Basketball Hall of Fame. </span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">What a beautiful sight: </strong></span><span>South Korea's LG Twins are regularly livestreaming intra-squad scrimmages at an empty baseball stadium for fans.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><img src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80ODAvbGdfdHdpbnNfaW50cmEtc3F1YWRfcHJhYy5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24ifQ==" class="img-responsive" width="640" style="width:100% !important;max-width: 640px; width: 100%;" alt="" data-reactroot=""></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 22px;"><small> <em>Chung Sung-Jun/Getty Images</em> </small></p>

<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
SPONSORED BY WHOOP
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">

<font color="#000000">
At-Home Fitness Just Got Way Smarter
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

<a href="https://ad.doubleclick.net/ddm/trackclk/N9515.3407870MORNINGBREW/B23898138.269583725;dc_trk_aid=464425089;dc_trk_cid=130238161;dc_lat=;dc_rdid=;tag_for_child_directed_treatment=;tfua=" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="WHOOP" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL3BsYWNlbWVudC9pbWFnZXMvMjQ4LzE1ODU1Nzc2NTctUGljdHVyZTEucG5nIiwiYnVja2V0IjoiY29tZXQtbW9ybmluZ2JyZXciLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Whether you’re tuning in to someone’s Instagram Live fitness class or finding a yoga tutorial on YouTube, keeping the body healthy and active right now is on everybody’s mind.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">With <a href="https://ad.doubleclick.net/ddm/trackclk/N9515.3407870MORNINGBREW/B23898138.269583725;dc_trk_aid=464425089;dc_trk_cid=130163821;dc_lat=;dc_rdid=;tag_for_child_directed_treatment=;tfua=" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">WHOOP</a>, we now have the power to program our workouts based on how recovered our bodies are and how much stress we can truly handle. The WHOOP Strain Coach and weekly performance reports tell us when to push and when it’s ok to hide under the covers and binge a new series.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Never before has a fitness tracker provided such valuable data about our lives—we’ve been geeking out so hard over here our bifocals are fogging up.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><a href="https://ad.doubleclick.net/ddm/trackclk/N9515.3407870MORNINGBREW/B23898138.269583725;dc_trk_aid=464425089;dc_trk_cid=130163821;dc_lat=;dc_rdid=;tag_for_child_directed_treatment=;tfua=" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">WHOOP</a> gives you 24/7 personalized recovery, performance, and sleep metrics, plus tons of cool data points way smarter than step counting.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Never second guess the status of your body’s well-being with WHOOP. </p>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
PUBLIC HEALTH
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/04/05/massachusetts-leads-first-major-us-contract-tracing-program?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Term of the Day: 'Contact Tracing'
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Radar tracking surveillance system to identify smartphones, on a smartphone" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yODQvZnJhbmNpc19zY2lhbGFiYmEuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Health authorities are breaking out the Yellow Pages to fight COVID-19. Last Friday, Massachusetts Gov. Charlie Baker <a href="https://www.wbur.org/commonhealth/2020/04/03/contact-tracing-coronavirus-massachusetts-baker?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">detailed</a> a “powerful tool” to stop the coronavirus’s spread: contact tracing. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">How it works: </strong>When a patient tests positive, you make a list of everyone they came in close contact with. Then, you find those people and make sure they self-isolate before infecting others. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">That sounds straightforward, but contact tracing a new patient typically <a href="https://www.statnews.com/2020/04/02/coronavirus-spreads-too-fast-for-contact-tracing-digital-tools-could-help/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">takes three days</a>, according to Stat, which is “an insurmountable hurdle in the U.S., with its low numbers of public health workers and tens of thousands of new cases every day.”</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">It's worked elsewhere</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">South Korea used high-tech contact tracing to tame its outbreak. The government <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/emerging-tech/stories/2020/03/20/us-weighs-location-tracking-coronavirus-response?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">compiled</a> GPS data, credit card swipes, and other info into a public log showing where COVID-19 patients had traveled.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Some countries (including the U.S.) are trying other methods, including looking at smartphone location data and developing Bluetooth systems that provide warnings if you’ve crossed paths with an infected person.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The hangup: </strong>Despite its widespread use in places like Singapore, contact tracing has raised concerns about privacy and governments following citizens’ whereabouts. Still, it's a term you'll be hearing a lot more of in the coming weeks. </p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Friday: </strong>Stock market closed for Good Friday; CPI inflation data; National Siblings Day </p>

</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Introducing <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/the-essentials/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">The Essentials</a>, the Brew’s guide to staying active, healthy, and happy while you’re riding out the pandemic at home. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In this newsletter, we’ll bring you...</p>

<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The most creative quarantine ideas floating around the internet</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The details: </strong>You’ll get The Essentials on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday evenings, perfectly timed for your commute home from the living room to the kitchen. The first edition, hitting inboxes worldwide in a few hours, is <img src="https://emojipedia-us.s3.dualstack.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/thumbs/120/apple/237/fire_1f525.png" width="18" style="max-width:18px" alt="">.</p>

<div class="clueDiv">9. <span class="clueText">Royal from Skull Island = Kong</span>
</div>
<div>10. <span class="clueText">Three-bagger = triple</span>
</div>
<div> </div>
<div>
<span class="clueText"><strong style="color:#000">Down</strong><br></span>1. Where you can find the Palm Jumeirah = Dubai</div>
<div>
<div class="glue-hdr-first-clue">
<div>2. "Sn" in the periodic table = tin</div>
</div>
<div class="clue-list">
<div>4. Rapper born as Nasir bin Olu Dara Jones = Nas</div>
</div>
<div class="clueDiv">5. Tokyo stock market index = Nikkei</div>
<div class="clueDiv">6. <span class="clueText">Alphabet subsidiary = Google</span>
</div>
</div>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</th>
</tr>
</table>

style=\"color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;\"\u003e\n\u003cfont color=\"#000000\"\u003e\nQuibi's Here to Tank Your Screen Time Report\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003c!--[if mso]\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"GIF of Quibi \" style=\"display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" height=378 src=\"https://oslo-production.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/medium/asset/478/quibi_gif.gif\"\u003e\n\u003c![endif]--\u003e\n\u003c!--[if !mso]\u003e--\u003e\u003c!-- --\u003e\n\u003cimg class=\"story-header-image\" alt=\"GIF of Quibi \" style=\"display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" src=\"https://oslo-production.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/medium/asset/478/quibi_gif.gif\"\u003e\n\u003c!--\u003c![endif]--\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eQuibi\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eToday's a big one. We put on pants for the first time in 24 days and Quibi finally launched. Led by former chair of The Walt Disney Studios Jeffrey Katzenberg and former HPE CEO Meg Whitman, Quibi is not only a grand experiment in mobile-first streaming, but the first major launch of the coronavirus pandemic. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe details\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eQuibi serves up \"quick bites\" of video from news to docuseries to feature films. Its signature \"Turnstyle\" tech lets you rotate the orientation of your phone without interrupting the video.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe bull case: \u003c/strong\u003eQuibi raised $1.8 billion before even launching. It's a completely new streaming product catering to Gen Z and millennials and already has 50 shows ready featuring names like Steven Spielberg, Reese Witherspoon, and JLo. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eCoronavirus has shut down most entertainment production, but Quibi's elbow-bumping itself for \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.forbes.com/sites/dawnchmielewski/2020/04/03/coronavirus-lockdown-will-boost-jeff-katzenbergs-and-meg-whitmans-new-mobile-streaming-service-quibi/#430e843955c3?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003estockpiling\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e content last fall over fears of a writers' strike. Whitman told Morning Brew’s \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://link.chtbl.com/megwhitman_all?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e\u003cem\u003eBusiness Casual\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e podcast they've got enough programming to last through mid-September. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe bear case: \u003c/strong\u003eConsumer awareness is pretty low and Quibi doesn't have a Jim Halpert fans will follow anywhere. Also...YouTube and TikTok are free. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eThe COVID-19 case \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWhitman and Katzenberg wanted Quibi \u003ca href=\"https://cheddar.com/media/will-the-coronavirus-pandemic-help-or-hurt-streaming-service-quibi?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eto fill\u003c/a\u003e those 10-minute breaks that pop up throughout your day, like waiting for a subway to arrive or for your CVS receipt to finish printing. Even with quarantines in place, Whitman thinks people will need small pockets of time to decompress.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eOne big thing going for Quibi: Consumers are spending a \u003cem\u003elot\u003c/em\u003e more time streaming, per Emerging Tech Brew's \u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/emerging-tech/stories/2020/04/03/covid-traffic-report?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eCOVID-19 Traffic Report\u003c/a\u003e. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cimg src=\"https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80NDAvc3RyZWFtaW5nX3N0YXRzX25pZWxzZW4ucG5nIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIn0=\" class=\"img-responsive\" width=\"640\" style=\"width:100% !important;max-width: 640px; width: 100%;\" alt=\"\" data-reactroot=\"\"\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;line-height: 22px;\"\u003e\u003csmall\u003e \u003cem\u003eFrancis Scialabba\u003c/em\u003e \u003c/small\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eAnd revenue? \u003c/strong\u003eQuibi sold out its first year's ad inventory ($150 million) last fall, though the ad industry looks like a playground spring rider right now.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eQuibi also has monthly subscription fees ($5/month with ads; $8 without). But Whitman said if you sign up by the end of April, you'll get 90 days free due to the pandemic.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003e+ Now, hear from Whitman herself: \u003c/strong\u003eShe's the guest on today's special episode of \u003cem\u003eBusiness Casual\u003c/em\u003e. style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe U.S.: \u003c/strong\u003ePresident Trump warned of a couple of very difficult weeks ahead, href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-04-04/trump-says-to-brace-for-very-very-deadly-period-due-to-virus?sref=1crrKBaO\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eGermany: \u003c/strong\u003eExperts are studying why the country, which has nearly 100,000 COVID-19 cases, has such a \u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2020/04/04/world/europe/germany-coronavirus-death-rate.html?searchResultPosition=1\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003elow death rate\u003c/a\u003e compared to its peers. On Sunday, Germany reported its third-straight daily drop in new cases. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eItaly: \u003c/strong\u003eOfficials are hoping the worst is over after the number of coronavirus patients in intensive care \u003ca href=\"https://nypost.com/2020/04/05/coronavirus-death-toll-slows-in-italy-as-icu-patients-declines/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003edropped\u003c/a\u003e for the first time on Saturday. Italy started halting nonessential economic activity in early March.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eAustralia: \u003c/strong\u003eThe government also believes it's \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-health-coronavirus-australia/australia-upbeat-over-slowing-coronavirus-spread-urges-vigilance-idUSKBN21N03U?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eturned a corner\u003c/a\u003e, but said social distancing measures will be the norm for months.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eAnd everywhere...\u003c/strong\u003ecountries are \u003ca href=\"https://www.ft.com/content/5c8cbc60-aec0-4f3d-b0e2-a5e44f0c6f74?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003estockpiling staple foods\u003c/a\u003e to make sure they can feed their populations, the FT reports. Morocco and the Philippines have bolstered their grain reserves, while Turkish traders are paying top price to import wheat. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eOn Saturday, President Trump held a \u003ca href=\"https://apnews.com/4c63d4382453e89bd169fdbfa29fc746?utm_source=morning_brew\" mind: When will sports be back? \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\"I can't tell you a date,\" Trump said after the call, though he said he href=\"https://www.si.com/nfl/2020/04/04/donald-trump-sports-call-nfl-season-start-fans-return-coronavirus?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esaid\u003c/a\u003e he doesn't expect the 2020 NFL season to start on schedule in his state.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eSports returning is not only a symbolic part of resuming our \"normal lives,\" but also a question of restarting the economy. collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eHealth authorities are breaking out the Yellow Pages to fight COVID-19. Last Friday, Massachusetts Gov. Charlie Baker \u003ca href=\"https://www.wbur.org/commonhealth/2020/04/03/contact-tracing-coronavirus-massachusetts-baker?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003edetailed\u003c/a\u003e a “powerful tool” to stop the coronavirus’s spread: contact tracing. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eHow it works: \u003c/strong\u003eWhen a patient tests positive, you make a list of everyone they came in close contact with. Then, you find those people and make sure they self-isolate before infecting others. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThat sounds straightforward, but contact tracing a new patient typically \u003ca href=\"https://www.statnews.com/2020/04/02/coronavirus-spreads-too-fast-for-contact-tracing-digital-tools-could-help/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003etakes three days\u003c/a\u003e, according to Stat, which is “an insurmountable hurdle in the U.S., with its low numbers of public health workers and tens of thousands of new cases every day.”\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eIt's worked elsewhere\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eSouth Korea used high-tech contact tracing to tame its outbreak. The government \u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/emerging-tech/stories/2020/03/20/us-weighs-location-tracking-coronavirus-response?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ecompiled\u003c/a\u003e GPS data, credit card swipes, and other info into a public log showing where COVID-19 patients had traveled.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eSome countries (including the U.S.) are trying other methods, including looking at smartphone location data and developing Bluetooth systems that provide warnings if you’ve crossed paths with an infected person.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe hangup: \u003c/strong\u003eDespite its widespread use in places like Singapore, contact tracing has raised concerns about privacy and governments following citizens’ whereabouts. Still, it's a term you'll be hearing a lot more of in the coming weeks. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\"
